isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - POWER DISTRIBUTION & GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - Battery Power Distribution (Without 3+1 Battery System)

svcproc.title: Battery Power Distribution (Without 3+1 Battery System)
svcproc.para: With the ignition key switch in the OFF position, the batteries provide power to the B1 and B2 battery studs. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - BATTERY circuit diagram in CTS-5119S. From the B1 and B2 battery studs, power is distributed to selected electrical systems.
